resources.string: To provide the best experience and ensure all features work correctly, Help Abroad needs the following permissions:
Allows the app to automatically detect your current country. This helps in quickly showing relevant emergency numbers and local information.
If denied, you will need to manually search for your country each time to see specific information.
Allows the app to directly initiate calls to emergency numbers when you tap on them. This ensures a faster response in critical situations.
If denied, the app will open your phone\'s dialer with the emergency number pre-filled, but you will need to manually press the call button.
Allows the app to send an SOS message, potentially including your current location, to pre-configured emergency contacts (this feature is planned for future updates).
If denied, the SOS SMS message feature will not be available. You would need to use other means to send such messages.
